articles.description: Sheffield United say they are "devastated" by the death of midfielder Maddy Cusack aged 27.

articles.description: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou tells Gary Lineker he never thought his Premier League chance would come and that he was "last man standing" this summer.
articles.title: Postecoglou on being a refugee, trophies and waiting

articles.description: France captain Antoine Dupont suffered a facial fracture in Thursday's 96-0 win against Namibia, the French Rugby Federation confirms.
articles.title: France captain Dupont suffers facial fracture

articles.description: Alpine's Pierre Gasly brought Friday practice to an early end at the Japanese Grand Prix with a crash as Max Verstappen dominated the day.
articles.title: Verstappen dominates Friday practice in Japan
